description: Provides more information on a calculated attribute definition for Customer Profiles.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The unique name of the domain.

parameters.name: CalculatedAttributeName
parameters.description: The unique name of the calculated attribute.

nested_items.name: CalculatedAttributeName
nested_items.description: The unique name of the calculated attribute.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the calculated attribute.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the calculated attribute.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the calculated attribute definition was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the calculated attribute definition was most recently edited.

nested_items.name: Statistic
nested_items.description: The aggregation operation to perform for the calculated attribute.

nested_items.name: Include
nested_items.description: Define whether to include or exclude objects for Calculated Attributed calculation that fit the filter groups criteria.

nested_items.name: Groups
nested_items.description: Holds the list of Filter groups within the Filter definition.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of logical relationship between the dimensions of the Filter group.

nested_items.name: Dimensions
nested_items.description: Object that holds the attributes to filter on.

nested_items.name: Attributes
nested_items.description: Is the attribute within the FilterDimension map.

nested_items.name: DimensionType
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: DimensionType
nested_items.description: The action to filter with.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The values to apply the DimensionType on.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Conditions
nested_items.description: The conditions including range, object count, and threshold for the calculated attribute.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The amount of time of the specified unit.

nested_items.name: Unit
nested_items.description: The unit of time.

nested_items.name: ObjectCount
nested_items.description: The number of profile objects used for the calculated attribute.

nested_items.name: Threshold
nested_items.description: The threshold for the calculated attribute.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the threshold.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: The operator of the threshold.

nested_items.name: AttributeDetails
nested_items.description: Mathematical expression and a list of attribute items specified in that expression.

nested_items.name: Attributes
nested_items.description: A list of attribute items specified in the mathematical expression.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of an attribute defined in a profile object type.

nested_items.name: Expression
nested_items.description: Mathematical expression that is performed on attribute items provided in the attribute list. Each element in the expression should follow the structure of "{ObjectTypeName.AttributeName}".
(string) ---
(string) ---
